Description: This field is used to record the start date of the documented period of greatest activity/flourishing of the documented actor.
This field is used to record the end date of the documented period of greatest activity/flourishing of the documented actor.
This field is used to record the location of the period of greatest activity/flourishing of the documented actor.
This field is used to record a field of activity that the documented actor pursued during their existence/lifetime.
This field is used to record the earliest possible date for the period in which the documented actor pursued a field of activity during their existence/lifetime.
This field is used to record the latest possible date for the period in which the documented actor pursued a field of activity during their existence/lifetime.
This field is used to record the location at which the documented actor pursued a field of activity during their existence/lifetime.
This field is used to record the subject of the education of the documented person.
